posts.author: WarlocksWisdom
posts.content:
I've been thinking about campaigns lately and wanted to get everyone's opinions.

Quick question about campaigns that came up in our game last night.

I'd love to hear everyone's experiences with campaigns and how it's worked in your games.

What do you all think? Has anyone else had similar questions about campaigns?

posts.author: MonkeyBusinessDM
posts.content:
The best campaign moment I ever had involved creative use of advice to solve what seemed like an impossible puzzle.

I think the RAW (Rules As Written) for advice are clear, but many DMs seem to interpret it differently.

I think the 2024 changes to advice make it much more balanced compared to before.

In my campaign, we had a situation with advice that played out really well. The player used it creatively to overcome a challenge I didn't expect them to solve.
